description: Under heavy load, and due to the way it is currently coded, quantum will frequently fail to deallocate ports on the switch. The solution is to ignore a failure to find a port by attachment, and simply issue a delete call for the port directly.
title: QuantumManager can't delete ports under load

comments.content: Under heavy load, and due to the way it is currently coded, quantum will frequently fail to deallocate ports on the switch. The solution is to ignore a failure to find a port by attachment, and simply issue a delete call for the port directly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cerberus
